text:
@RahulGandhi How are you dismayed by the unfollowing of the white house .
You should be dismayed at the following 
The planned palghar  horrendous act of lynching .
The spread of COVID19 by your chinese friends .
Corruption cases of ROBERt Vadra and your self .
